addCard(Card) - Method in class domain.Player
Input card is added to the player's cards ArrayList.

This method adds the given money amount to the player.

This method takes a SquareProperty object and adds it to the player.

This method takes square as a parameter and does the action of the card to the player.

applyCard40(boolean, Player) - Method in class domain.CardCommunity

applyCard49(Player, int) - Method in class domain.CardCommunity

auction(SquareProperty, int[]) - Method in class domain.Bank
This method takes a property and bids from all players; finds highest bid; and sells the property to the player with highest bid.
auctionStock(String, int[]) - Method in class domain.Bank
This method takes a company name and bids from all players; finds highest bid; and sells one share of that company to the player with highest bid.
